privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: How we collect, use, and protect your personal information
privacy.introText: This privacy policy outlines how we collect, use, process, and protect your personal information when you visit our website or use our services.
privacy.informationCollectionText: We collect the following types of information when you use our website:
privacy.personalInfoItem1: Contact information (such as name, email address)
privacy.personalInfoItem2: Account information (if you create an account)
privacy.personalInfoItem3: Communication information (such as messages you send us)
privacy.nonPersonalInfoText: We automatically collect certain non-personal information, including browser type, device information, operating system, and website usage statistics.
privacy.cookiesText: We use cookies to improve your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, personalize content, and serve targeted advertisements.
privacy.dataUsageText: We use the collected information to provide and improve our services, communicate with you, analyze usage patterns, and comply with legal obligations.
privacy.dataProtectionText: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
privacy.thirdPartyText: We may use third-party services that collect, monitor and analyze this information to improve our service's functionality and user experience.
privacy.policyChangesText: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
privacy.contactText: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@example.com.

moral.title: Moral Code
moral.description: Our guiding principles and ethical standards
moral.moralIntro: This moral code outlines the principles and values that guide our work, interactions, and decisions. These principles reflect our commitment to ethical conduct and responsible practices.
moral.principle1Text: We are committed to honesty and integrity in all our actions. We communicate transparently, fulfill our promises, and take responsibility for our mistakes.
moral.principle2Text: We treat everyone with respect and dignity. We embrace diversity, promote inclusivity, and create an environment where everyone feels valued and heard.
moral.principle3Text: We respect user privacy and handle personal data with the utmost care. We collect only necessary information and protect it using industry-standard security measures.
moral.principle4Text: We strive for excellence in everything we do. We maintain high standards for our work, continuously improve our skills, and deliver solutions that provide real value.
moral.principle5Text: We acknowledge our responsibility to society and the environment. We make conscious choices that minimize our environmental impact and contribute positively to communities.
moral.conclusionText: This moral code is not just a document but a commitment to living these principles daily. We invite feedback and hold ourselves accountable to these standards in all our endeavors.
